Description: Each requirement shall be testable through a unit test function
Test functions shall return system_error_message enum values only
Each requirement shall be linked to source code and a test result
System shall initialize all node memory to zero on power-up
Node 0 shall remain set to zero throughout runtime
Nodes above index 0 shall be settable and gettable
Node values set via set_Node() shall be retrievable via get_Node()
set_Node() shall return error when accessing out-of-range index
get_Node() shall return an error and a dummy value on out-of-range access
System shall report memory integrity diagnostics through error enums
